mapper.select: SELECT shop_item_id, shop_item_name, shop_item_desc, shop_item_price, shop_item_img, shop_item_date, shop_item_stock, shop_item_view FROM ShopItems WHERE shop_item_id = #{id}

SELECT shop_item_id, shop_item_name, shop_item_desc, shop_item_price, shop_item_img, shop_item_date, shop_item_stock, shop_item_view FROM ShopItems WHERE shop_item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
SELECT shop_item_id, shop_item_name, shop_item_desc, shop_item_price, shop_item_img, shop_item_date, shop_item_stock, shop_item_view FROM ShopItems
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ShopItems (shop_item_name, shop_item_desc, shop_item_price, shop_item_img, shop_item_date, shop_item_stock) VALUES (#{shopItemName}, #{shopItemDesc}, #{shopItemPrice}, #{shopItemImg}, #{shopItemDate}, #{shopItemStock})
